headline: Corpay to Acquire Leading Brazilian Mobile Payments Company
summary: ATLANTA, February 03, 2025--Corpay, Inc. (NYSE: CPAY), a global S&P 500 corporate payments company, today announced it has signed definitive documents to acquire Gringo, a leading vehicle registration and compliance payment company in Brazil.
